message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $10500 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $11800.
